price: Eles e suas mulheres estarão na sombra, reclinados sobre coxins.
arabic: هُمۡ وَأَزۡوَٰجُهُمۡ فِي ظِلَٰلٍ عَلَى ٱلۡأَرَآئِكِ مُتَّكِـُٔونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: hum wa-azwājuhum fī ẓilālin ʿalā al-arāiki muttakiūna
